info.title: Blink GraphQL API Reference
info.description: This is a machine-readable representation of the Blink GraphQL API schema, designed for LLM consumption.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the items in the list that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the items in the list that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns the first n items from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns the last n items from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the items in the list that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the items in the list that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns the first n items from the list.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns the last n items from the list.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

fields.name: interval
fields.description: The rolling time interval in seconds that the limits would apply for.

fields.name: remainingLimit
fields.description: The amount of cents remaining below the limit for the current 24 hour period.

fields.name: totalLimit
fields.description: The current maximum limit for a given 24 hour period.

fields.name: convert
fields.description: Limits for converting between currencies among a account's own wallets.

fields.name: internalSend
fields.description: Limits for sending to other internal accounts.

fields.name: withdrawal
fields.description: Limits for withdrawing to external onchain or lightning destinations.

types.name: AuthToken
types.description: An Opaque Bearer token

types.name: BTCWallet
types.description: A wallet belonging to an account which contains a BTC balance and a list of transactions.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: A balance stored in BTC.

fields.name: invoices
fields.description: A list of all invoices associated with walletIds optionally passed.

types.name: ContactAlias
types.description: An alias name that a user can set for a wallet (with which they have transactions)

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: CountryCode
types.description: A CCA2 country code (ex US, FR, etc)

fields.name: btcSatAmount
fields.description: Amount in satoshis.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp (number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC)

fields.name: usdCentAmount
fields.description: Amount in USD cents.

fields.name: minBankFeeThreshold
fields.description: below this amount minBankFee will be charged

fields.name: ratio
fields.description: ratio to charge as basis points above minBankFeeThreshold amount

types.name: DisplayCurrency
types.description: Display currency of an account

types.name: EmailAddress
types.description: Email address

types.name: EmailRegistrationId
types.description: An id to be passed between registrationInitiate and registrationValidate for confirming email

types.name: EndpointUrl
types.description: Url that will be fetched on events for the account

types.name: Feedback
types.description: Feedback shared with our user

types.name: Globals
types.description: Provides global settings for the application which might have an impact for the user.

fields.name: lightningAddressDomain
fields.description: The domain name for lightning addresses accepted by this Galoy instance

fields.name: network
fields.description: Which network (mainnet, testnet, regtest, signet) this instance is running on.

fields.name: nodesIds
fields.description:
A list of public keys for the running lightning nodes.
This can be used to know if an invoice belongs to one of our nodes.

fields.name: supportedCountries
fields.description: A list of countries and their supported auth channels

types.name: Hex32Bytes
types.description: Hex-encoded string of 32 bytes

inputFields.name: memo

types.name: Invoice
types.description: A lightning invoice.

fields.name: externalId
fields.description: The unique external id set for the invoice.

fields.name: paymentHash

fields.name: paymentRequest
fields.description: The bolt11 invoice to be paid.

fields.name: paymentSecret
fields.description: The payment secret of the lightning invoice. This is not the preimage of the payment hash.

fields.name: paymentStatus
fields.description: The payment status of the invoice.

inputFields.description: Wallet ID with sufficient balance to cover amount of invoice.  Must belong to the account of the current user.

types.name: LnPaymentRequest

inputFields.name: expiresIn
inputFields.description: Optional invoice expiration time in minutes.

inputFields.name: memo
inputFields.description: Optional memo for the lightning invoice. Acts as a note to the recipient.

inputFields.description: Wallet ID for a USD wallet which belongs to the account of any user.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Amount in USD cents.

inputFields.name: expiresIn
inputFields.description: Optional invoice expiration time in minutes.

inputFields.name: memo
inputFields.description: Optional memo for the lightning invoice.

inputFields.name: walletId
inputFields.description: Wallet ID for a USD wallet belonging to the current user.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Amount in USD cents.

inputFields.name: expiresIn
inputFields.description: Optional invoice expiration time in minutes.

inputFields.name: memo
inputFields.description: Optional memo for the lightning invoice. Acts as a note to the recipient.

inputFields.name: recipientWalletId
inputFields.description: Wallet ID for a USD wallet which belongs to the account of any user.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: Amount in satoshis.

inputFields.name: lnurl
inputFields.description: Lnurl string to send to.

inputFields.name: walletId

types.name: Memo
types.description: Text field in a lightning payment transaction

fields.name: coordinates
fields.description: GPS coordinates for the merchant that can be used to place the related business on a map

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username of the merchant

fields.name: validated
fields.description: Whether the merchant has been validated

types.name: Minutes
types.description: (Positive) amount of minutes

fields.name: intraLedgerPaymentSend
fields.description:
Actions a payment which is internal to the ledger e.g. it does
not use onchain/lightning. Returns payment status (success,
failed, pending, already_paid).

fields.name: intraLedgerUsdPaymentSend
fields.description:
Actions a payment which is internal to the ledger e.g. it does
not use onchain/lightning. Returns payment status (success,
failed, pending, already_paid).

fields.name: lnAddressPaymentSend
fields.description: Sends a payment to a lightning address.

fields.name: lnInvoiceCancel
fields.description: Cancel an unpaid lightning invoice for an associated wallet.

fields.name: lnInvoiceCreate
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice for an associated wallet.
When invoice is paid the value will be credited to a BTC wallet.
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 24 hours.

fields.name: lnInvoiceCreateOnBehalfOfRecipient
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice for an associated wallet.
When invoice is paid the value will be credited to a BTC wallet.
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 24 hours.

fields.name: lnInvoicePaymentSend
fields.description:
Pay a lightning invoice using a balance from a wallet which is owned by the account of the current user.
Provided wallet can be USD or BTC and must have sufficient balance to cover amount in lightning invoice.
Returns payment status (success, failed, pending, already_paid).

fields.name: lnNoAmountInvoiceCreate
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice for an associated wallet.
Can be used to receive any supported currency value (currently USD or BTC).
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 24 hours for BTC invoices or 5 minutes for USD invoices.

fields.name: lnNoAmountInvoiceCreateOnBehalfOfRecipient
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice for an associated wallet.
Can be used to receive any supported currency value (currently USD or BTC).
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 24 hours for BTC invoices or 5 minutes for USD invoices.

fields.name: lnNoAmountInvoicePaymentSend
fields.description:
Pay a lightning invoice using a balance from a wallet which is owned by the account of the current user.
Provided wallet must be BTC and must have sufficient balance to cover amount specified in mutation request.
Returns payment status (success, failed, pending, already_paid).

fields.name: lnNoAmountUsdInvoicePaymentSend
fields.description:
Pay a lightning invoice using a balance from a wallet which is owned by the account of the current user.
Provided wallet must be USD and have sufficient balance to cover amount specified in mutation request.
Returns payment status (success, failed, pending, already_paid).

fields.name: lnUsdInvoiceBtcDenominatedCreateOnBehalfOfRecipient
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice denominated in satoshis for an associated wallet.
When invoice is paid the equivalent value at invoice creation will be credited to a USD wallet.
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 5 minutes (short expiry time because there is a USD/BTC exchange rate
  associated with the amount).

fields.name: lnUsdInvoiceCreate
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice denominated in satoshis for an associated wallet.
When invoice is paid the equivalent value at invoice creation will be credited to a USD wallet.
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 5 minutes (short expiry time because there is a USD/BTC exchange rate
associated with the amount).

fields.name: lnUsdInvoiceCreateOnBehalfOfRecipient
fields.description:
Returns a lightning invoice denominated in satoshis for an associated wallet.
When invoice is paid the equivalent value at invoice creation will be credited to a USD wallet.
Expires after 'expiresIn' or 5 minutes (short expiry time because there is a USD/BTC exchange rate
  associated with the amount).

fields.name: lnurlPaymentSend
fields.description: Sends a payment to a lightning address.

fields.name: userUpdateUsername
fields.deprecationReason: Username will be moved to @Handle in Accounts. Also SetUsername naming should be used instead of UpdateUsername to reflect the idempotency of Handles

types.name: OnChainAddress
types.description: An address for an on-chain bitcoin destination

fields.name: interval
fields.description: The rolling time interval value in seconds for the current 24 hour period.

fields.name: remainingLimit
fields.description: The amount of cents remaining below the limit for the current 24 hour period.

fields.name: totalLimit
fields.description: The current maximum limit for a given 24 hour period.

types.name: OneTimeAuthCode
types.description: An authentication code valid for a single use

types.name: PageInfo
types.description: Information about pagination in a connection.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: When paginating forwards, the cursor to continue.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: When paginating forwards, are there more items?

fields.name: hasPreviousPage
fields.description: When paginating backwards, are there more items?

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: When paginating backwards, the cursor to continue.

types.name: Phone
types.description: Phone number which includes country code

types.name: Price
types.description: Price amount expressed in base/offset. To calculate, use: `base / 10^offset`

types.name: PriceGraphRange
types.description: The range for the X axis in the BTC price graph

types.name: PriceOfOneSatInMinorUnit
types.description: Price of 1 sat in base/offset. To calculate, use: `base / 10^offset`

types.name: PriceOfOneSettlementMinorUnitInDisplayMinorUnit
types.description: Price of 1 sat or 1 usd cent in base/offset. To calculate, use: `base / 10^offset`

types.name: PriceOfOneUsdCentInMinorUnit
types.description: Price of 1 usd cent in base/offset. To calculate, use: `base / 10^offset`

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp (number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC)

types.name: PublicWallet
types.description: A public view of a generic wallet which stores value in one of our supported currencies.

fields.name: authorization
fields.description: Retrieve the list of scopes permitted for the user's token or API key

fields.name: currencyConversionEstimation
fields.description: Returns an estimated conversion rate for the given amount and currency

args.name: amount
args.description: Amount in major unit.

args.name: currency
args.description: Currency of the amount to be converted.

fields.name: realtimePrice
fields.description: Returns 1 Sat and 1 Usd Cent price for the given currency in minor unit

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The reward in Satoshis for the quiz question

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp (number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC)

types.name: SafeInt
types.description: Non-fractional signed whole numeric value between -(2^53) + 1 and 2^53 - 1

types.name: SatAmount
types.description: (Positive) Satoshi amount

types.name: Seconds
types.description: (Positive) amount of seconds

fields.name: counterPartyUsername
fields.description: Settlement destination: Could be null if the payee does not have a username

fields.name: paymentSecret
fields.deprecationReason: Shifting property to 'preImage' to improve granularity of the LnPaymentSecret type

types.name: SignedAmount
types.description: An amount (of a currency) that can be negative (e.g. in a transaction)

types.name: SignedDisplayMajorAmount
types.description: A string amount (of a currency) that can be negative (e.g. in a transaction)

fields.name: realtimePrice
fields.description: Returns the price of 1 satoshi

types.name: Timestamp
types.description: Timestamp field, serialized as Unix time (the number of seconds since the Unix epoch)

types.name: TotpCode
types.description: A time-based one-time password

types.name: TotpRegistrationId
types.description: An id to be passed between set and verify for confirming totp

types.name: TotpSecret
types.description: A secret to generate time-based one-time password

types.name: Transaction
types.description:
Give details about an individual transaction.
Galoy have a smart routing system which is automatically
settling intraledger when both the payer and payee use the same wallet
therefore it's possible the transactions is being initiated onchain
or with lightning but settled intraledger.

fields.name: initiationVia
fields.description: From which protocol the payment has been initiated.

fields.name: settlementAmount
fields.description: Amount of the settlement currency sent or received.

fields.name: settlementCurrency
fields.description: Wallet currency for transaction.

fields.name: settlementPrice
fields.description: Price in WALLETCURRENCY/SETTLEMENTUNIT at time of settlement.

fields.name: settlementVia
fields.description: To which protocol the payment has settled on.

types.name: TransactionConnection
types.description: A connection to a list of items.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

types.name: TransactionEdge
types.description: An edge in a connection.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of the edge

types.name: TxExternalId
types.description: An external reference id that can be optionally added for transactions.

types.name: UsdWallet
types.description: A wallet belonging to an account which contains a USD balance and a list of transactions.

fields.name: invoices
fields.description: A list of all invoices associated with walletIds optionally passed.

fields.name: contactByUsername
fields.description:
Get single contact details.
Can include the transactions associated with the contact.

fields.name: contacts
fields.description:
Get full list of contacts.
Can include the transactions associated with each contact.

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email address

fields.name: language
fields.description:
Preferred language for user.
When value is 'default' the intent is to use preferred language from OS settings.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Phone number with international calling code.

fields.name: totpEnabled
fields.description: Whether TOTP is enabled for this user.

fields.name: username
fields.description: Optional immutable user friendly identifier.
fields.deprecationReason: will be moved to @Handle in Account and Wallet

fields.name: alias
fields.description:
Alias the user can set for this contact.
Only the user can see the alias attached to their contact.

fields.name: transactions
fields.description: Paginated list of transactions sent to/from this contact.

fields.name: pendingIncomingTransactions
fields.description:
Pending incoming OnChain transactions. When transactions
are confirmed they will receive a new id and be found in the transactions
list. Transactions are ordered anti-chronologically,
ie: the newest transaction will be first

fields.name: pendingIncomingTransactionsByAddress
fields.description:
Pending incoming OnChain transactions. When transactions
are confirmed they will receive a new id and be found in the transactions
list. Transactions are ordered anti-chronologically,
ie: the newest transaction will be first

args.name: address
args.description: Returns the items that include this address.

fields.name: transactions
fields.description:
Transactions are ordered anti-chronologically,
ie: the newest transaction will be first

args.description: Returns the items in the list that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: before

args.name: first

args.name: last
args.description: Returns the last n items from the list.

fields.name: transactionsByAddress
fields.description:
Transactions are ordered anti-chronologically,
ie: the newest transaction will be first

fields.name: transactionsByPaymentHash
fields.description: Returns the transactions that include this paymentHash. This should be a list of size one for a received lightning payment. This can be more that one transaction for a sent lightning payment.

args.name: paymentHash
args.description: The payment hash of the lightning invoice paid in this transaction.

fields.name: transactionsByPaymentRequest
fields.description: Returns the transactions that include this paymentRequest.

args.name: paymentRequest
args.description: Lightning invoice paid in this transaction.

types.name: WalletId
types.description: Unique identifier of a wallet
